page.title: 07Beetham Nurseries
page.content: There are two in this area.Beetham Nurseries opened four months ago,but preparations started six mounths before.It sells several hundred varieties of plants to the public but no cut flowers. It opens eight thirty a.m and closes between six and seven p.m.The busiest times of the year are Sundays in Spring.They have five staff,three part time and two full time.They have about three acres of land,which was bought from a local land owner.They are optimistic about the future and are planning to extend.They are already planning greenhouses for growing their own plants.
